price: Sila namni isaan irraa ta'e hundi jannata qananii seensifamuu kajeelaa?
arabic: أَيَطۡمَعُ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ أَن يُدۡخَلَ جَنَّةَ نَعِيمٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ayaṭmaʿu kullu im'ri-in min'hum an yud'khala jannata naʿīmin
